channel.title: Need A Hoster!
channel.description:
Hello, i'm in need of a hoster. If can host from 9 A.M (eastern time) until 11P.M. (eastern time) Or if you can host 24/7 that would be great! The reason I can't host is I don't get how to PortForward.
Internet Type:
How Long can you host?
When can you host?
Are you any good?
Can I trust you and will you listen to what needs to be done? Msn/Yahoo:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 03:08:14 PM[/size][hr]C'mon someone please help? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] This section is for the development of servers, this can be helping someone with a problem they have with their [b]server[/b] or posting code snippets to improve [b]servers[/b], nothing else.[/center] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] [/center]
